mapper.sql: Id, MemberId, WithwardNo, Amount, AfterAmount, Status, Remark, CreateName, CreateTime, OptName, OptTime, AccountType, AccountNo
mapper.select:
select w.Id, w.MemberId, w.WithwardNo, w.Amount, w.AfterAmount, w.Status, w.Remark, w.CreateName, w.CreateTime, w.SuccessTime, w.OptName, w.OptTime, w.AccountType, w.AccountNo,
CASE WHEN w.Status = 1 THEN '待审核' WHEN w.Status = 2 THEN '审核通过' WHEN w.Status = 3 THEN '打款完成' WHEN w.Status = -1 THEN '审核拒绝' WHEN w.Status =-2 THEN '打款失败' else '其它' END AS statusName from withdrawform w where w.Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select w.Id, w.MemberId, w.WithwardNo, w.Amount, w.AfterAmount, w.Status, w.Remark, w.CreateName, w.CreateTime, w.OptName, w.OptTime, w.AccountType, w.AccountNo,
CASE WHEN w.AccountType = 1 THEN '网银' WHEN w.AccountType = 2 THEN '支付宝' WHEN w.AccountType = 3 THEN '微信' else '其它' END AS statusName from withdrawform w where w.memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into withdrawform ( MemberId, WithwardNo, Amount, AfterAmount, Status, Remark, CreateName, CreateTime, SuccessTime, OptName, OptTime, AccountType, AccountNo) values ( #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{withwardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{afteramount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{successtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{optname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountno,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into withdrawform
MemberId,
WithwardNo,
Amount,
AfterAmount,
Status,
Remark,
CreateName,
CreateTime,
SuccessTime,
OptName,
OptTime,
AccountType,
AccountNo,

mapper.update:
update withdrawform
MemberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WithwardNo = #{withwardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL},
AfterAmount = #{afteramount,jdbcType=REAL},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SuccessTime = #{successtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OptName = #{optname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OptTime = #{opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AccountType = #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AccountNo = #{accountno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update withdrawform set MemberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WithwardNo = #{withwardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, AfterAmount = #{afteramount,jdbcType=REAL}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SuccessTime = #{successtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OptName = #{optname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OptTime = #{opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AccountType = #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AccountNo = #{accountno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql:
1=1
and Status=${status}
and CreateName like ''%${createName}%''
and CreateTime>=''${startTime}''
and date_add(''${endTime}'', INTERVAL 1 day)>CreateTime
mapper.select:
{call Sp_CustomPage2015_V1( ' Id desc ', ' a.* ', ' withdrawform as a ', '
', #{pageSize,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentPage,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalRecord,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPage,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER} )}
